name: Save The World (itch) (Senem)
description:
Shoot the targets that appear on the radar as soon as possible in order to be able to protect our world. For each destroyed meteor, the score is kept. The game is over when 5 asteroids hit the earth in total.

Credits:

  • Senem Aksakal,
  • Ayşenur Şeref
  • Umutcan Ertürk
  • Fatih Kökçüler
